title: Stargazer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attempt to match two people based on their horoscopes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each player in the game will have a star sign assigned to them. Every star sign will be present among all players in the game. (if this is not possible, this role is rerolled)
- If you match two players whose star signs are compatible, they will learn each other's roles, and they may now win with each other. Players with the same sign star signs are **not** compatible with each other
- You may not match players that are already matched.
- You may match yourself with another player as long as your star signs are compatible.
- You lose the ability to match players once you achieve your win condition.

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: Refer to this image to see which signs are compatible with each other.

desc:
Post 268
*Sorry, I couldn't help committing identity thief to several innocent people! It's just a Scorpio thing!*
